oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Rural areas; Country life ; Rifles

Ganier, Albert Franklin, 1883-1973; York, Alvin Cullum, 1887-1964; Sergeant York (Motion picture); Tennessee -- Social life and customs; Appalachians (People) -- Tennessee; Rural families -- Appalachian region; Rifle practice
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Forty or more men and boys are lined up for the rifle shoot. Six women are also present. Only one long rifle is in evidence, along with two dead turkeys.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Albert F. Ganier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Rifle shoots brought together many expert riflemen. A public rifle shoot could draw the finest sharpshooters in an area.
